data.name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.detailed_description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen" with Lucy Liu 🌟

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and explore moonlit cabins 🌙, climb rigging, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to seize control of the fleet. 🏴‍☠️

EMBARK ON A VR ADVENTURE


Travel back in time with this immersive experience, perfect for explorers of all ages.

Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this forgotten legend is for you.




Experience a range of breathtaking environments, from the depths of a 19th-century pirate ship to treacherous waters and a mystical shrine.

CREATED BY ELOISE SINGER & LUCY LIU


Experience a captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu 🎭, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer 🎬



With light puzzle elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience, and discover a forgotten tale on the South China Sea. ✨



Celebrated for its cinematic narrative and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) 🏆



Over the past 5 years, the studio has worked closely with academics, researchers and sensitivity checkers to create historically accurate environments and a narrative inspired by real events.

Driven to authentically portray 19th-century China, this research with academic experts included a detailed study into the British-China relations of the era.

ARE YOU READY TO CLIMB ABOARD?


With gameplay lasting 1-4 hours ⏳, and centred on the pivotal night Cheng Shih becomes leader, this immersive story is just the beginning of an expansive Pirate Queen franchise.



Created by Singer Studios, executive produced by Lucy Liu and Eloise Singer, the franchise will extend into a visually stunning graphic novel, film, and TV series.

Do you have what it takes to turn the tides of history? Let’s see how well you fare as the Pirate Queen! 🏴‍☠️👑

data.short_description: The Pirate Queen is an Emmy-nominated narrative adventure starring Lucy Liu. Climb aboard a 19th century Chinese pirate ship, explore moonlit cabins, unearth treasure and embark on a journey to become the most powerful pirate of all time. Do you have what it takes to be crowned The Pirate Queen?
data.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
data.reviews:
“Singer Studios debut title, The Pirate Queen, is the exact kind of immersive history that makes VR so special”
Fandom Wire

“Inside Cheng Shih’s cabin, I lit a joss stick and placed it in an incense holder — an action I repeated every week at my grandfather’s altar when I was growing up. It felt so realistic that I tried to wave the joss stick to put out the flame and could almost smell the smoke.”
Engadget

“Take a moment to listen to Lucy Liu's brilliant narration of the tale, if you do, I promise you will learn something you never knew”
Android Central

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 操作系统: Windows 10
  • 处理器: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • 内存: 12 GB RAM
  • 显卡: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX 版本: 11
  • 声卡: Uses VR headset
  • 支持 VR: OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale.
  • 附注事项: Requires a VR headset with 2 motion controllers. Windows 10 recommended for Oculus VR headsets
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 处理器: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • 内存: 16 GB RAM
  • 显卡: NVIDIA BTX 3060
